name: Battle Island
description:
This a a Pre Alpha version of the game with very little options or content atm.

We are testing and trying out ideas for a Battle Royale type game and would like feedback and suggestions from anyone willing to try this game.

Our goal is to create a fun and enjoyable online multiplayer game.

Controls are  KEYBOARD / MOUSE

WASD + MOUSE = MOVEMENT

F = PICKUP

SPACEBAR = JUMP
